[A]Installation Steps(Configuration)
(start the php file using an apache server I prefer XAMPP)

1. Download and Unzip the file on your local system.
2. copy fm folder and put this file inside root directory(for xampp is htdocs,for wamp is www and for lamp is var/www/)
3. Database Configuration


[B]Open phpmyadmin

1.Create Database fm.
2.Import database fm.sql(file available inside the package) in phpmyadmin
3.Open Your browser put inside browser “http://localhost/fm/index.php”
4.Login details for user

USERNAME:shreyas
PASSWORD:shreyas
